Skills

Base: The score that all characters get for free. From here, players can advance their character by spending Skill Points or Advancement Points.
Max: The character cannot advance their Skill Score higher than the max score.


Acrobatics • Base: AGI ÷ 2 • Max: STR + AGI
Climb, jump, tumble and stunts.

Alchemy • Base: 0 • Max: PER · 2
Identify substances by taste, smell, texture and chemical tests. Create and/or render dyes, soaps, oils, smoke powders, tars, etc.

Appraisal • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER · 2
Guestimate price and authenticity of artwork, gems, coins, weapons, armor and even buildings.

Athletics • Base: STR ÷ 2 • Max: STR + TOU
Run, march, swim, endure physical stress.

Craft [Type] • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER + WIL
[Type] can be a craft, art or science such as carpenter, engineer, mason, painter, weaponsmith, etc.

Creature Lore • Base: 0 • Max: PER · 2
Guestimate an approximation of a key knowledge such as Movement Rate, Defense Score, Hit Points, an Attribute Score, Skill Score, etc.

Deception • Base: CHA ÷ 2 • Max: PER + CHA
Disguise, bluff, lie, impersonate.

Geography • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER · 2
Travel routes, local area knowledge, imports/exports, local prices, local laws.

Healing • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER · 2
First Aid, identify diseases and poisons. You can heal 1d6 HP on a successful Healing check. A creature can only receive one such healing per day.

History • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER · 2
Local lore, ancient lore. Knowledge of the old gods, of ancient cultures, races heroes and items.

Languages • Base: 0 • Max: PER + CHA
Speak score ÷ 10 langauges in addition to your mother tongue.

Literacy • Base: 0 • Max: PER · 2
Read and write score ÷ 10 languages.

Melee Combat • Base: AGI ÷ 2 • Max: STR + AGI
Attack with a melee weapon or hand-to-hand.

Negotiation • Base: CHA ÷ 2 • Max: PER + CHA
Intimidation, haggling, interrogation.

Ranged Combat • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: AGI + PER
Attack with a missile- or thrown weapon.

Riding • Base: WIL ÷ 2 • Max: WIL + CHA
Horses, stags, griffons.

Stealth • Base: AGI ÷ 2 • Max: AGI · 2
Hide, sneak, camouflage.

Survival • Base: PER ÷ 2 • Max: PER + WIL
Hunting, gathering, direction sense.

Thaumaturgy • Base: 0 • Max: PER · 2
Cast thaumaturgy spells.

Thievery • Base: AGI ÷ 2 • Max: AGI + PER
Pick locks, slight of hand.

Witchcraft • Base: 0 • Max: WIL + CHA
Cast witchcraft spells.
